long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cookie Controller is an add-on that allows you to manage the use of cookies on all the websites controlled by 6 of the most important CMP.
The CMPs in question are Complianz, CookieNotice, CookieYes, Didomi, OneTrust and Osano. The list includes CookieYes and CookieNotices, the two most widely used CMPs in the world, with more than half a million users each.
The options offered to users are to accept them all, reject them all or do nothing with cookie management.
